title: 100_html_CSS_examples.qmd
text:
PURPOSE: .qmd files, markdown, r code (knitr), CSS (via external CSS), embeded CSS in this page
USAGE1: quarto preview <file.qmd> renders and displays in browser
USAGE2: quarto render <file.qmd>; To view xdg-open <file.html>
_quarto.xml controls output dir for .html **
The echo: false option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
We can use CSS or SASS to style individual words, or link phrases for spans (in-line), paragraphs divs (see selector) or or formatting elements (e.g. header 2)
pink link to nytimes.com
using angle brackets: https://nytimes.com
red text
background yellow
both red & background yellow
This uses class from .css file, .blueish
<.blueish>what color am I? </.blueish>
This is “greenish” from external .css file
::: This paragrpah should be in very small font. ;aldkjf dsaf;ldsa fsa fdsa. lkajf sal;df as. adfljdf . adsflkjaf sa. a;lkdfj ad;f :::
inline R: 2023-07-09

title: 100_html_CSS_examples.qmd
text:
